title: Luxury Apartment Renovation
meta_description: A complete overhaul of a pre-war Manhattan apartment, balancing classic architecture with modern comforts and state-of-the-art technology.

hero_image.alt: A beautifully renovated luxury apartment living room with a view of the city.

challenge: To modernize a historic pre-war apartment for a young family, increasing natural light and creating an open-plan living space without sacrificing the unit's original architectural character.
insight: By embracing the 'bones' of the apartment, we could use modern interventions—like a floating steel staircase and custom minimalist cabinetry—as a counterpoint to the classic mouldings and herringbone floors.
solution: We reconfigured the layout to create a large kitchen and living area, specified custom lighting to brighten the space, and used a palette of warm neutrals and rich textures to create a cozy yet sophisticated atmosphere.

gallery.alt: Detail shot of the custom marble kitchen island.
gallery.caption: The Calacatta marble island serves as the social hub of the new open-plan space.

gallery.alt: The master bedroom with floor-to-ceiling windows.
gallery.caption: A serene master suite was designed as a private retreat from the bustling city.

testimonial.quote: Nobho understood our vision perfectly. They transformed our cramped, dark apartment into a bright, functional, and beautiful home that our family will cherish for years to come.
